website_summaries.verdict: Offers a number of safety features – and a steamer basket – at a good price.
pros: 18/10 stainless steel construction with an encapsulated aluminum base for even heat distribution
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
cons: A good size for smaller families, but don't expect to cook for a crowd
Some reports of this cooker no longer holding pressure after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pressure cooker on the Flash Sale after reading all the great 5 star reviews. I have to say that, even after reading all the reviews, I am beyond amazed at the quality and feel. I've received and used it today for the first time, couldn't wait! I'm in love with it. My family has used pressure cookers for generations in Brazil, and I continue to use them in the US, and by far...this is the best one I have ever seen and owned. Love the fact that it comes with a glass lid and can be used as a regular pot. Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: Brasileirinha412

customer_reviews.title: Amazing meals in incredibly short time! Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy! Never used pressure cooker in my entire life and gave this a try after a friend’s recommendation. It’s a bit hard for me to figure out at first, but once I’m comfortable handling the cooking, everything is just amazing. I was able to cook a beef bone broth for the family in less than 1hr (which normally calls for 24-48hr slow cooking and adding water). And I used it to cook a whole chicken in less than 20min. It’s an amazing addition and I’d wish I have known how to use sooner. It’s acuslly easier to use than the fancy instant pot. And cleanup was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Nice small pot
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for several months now. I am new to pressure cooking, my previous one only lasted a few months and the pressure valve broke off. I find that the pressure valve on this doesn't always pop up, sometimes you can tell it's up to pressure but the valve isn't up, jiggle the pot a little and it pops up. This pot is small, I didn't need a full size, it's narrow and tall. Seems to be sturdy, thick bottom, no burned, stuck on food. Nice basket to keep my potatoes and vegetables out of the broth. Rubber gasket is sturdy also. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: judyj3000

customer_reviews.title: Stovetop Pressure Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have two electric pressure cookers that work fine. I also have two large pressure canners that are huge and heavy. I saw this one and thought like Goldilocks, "this one seems just right!" It is. It is easy to carry, perfect for a family meal, and can be used when there is no electricity! It cooks and vents like the electric ones. The only difference is this one is taller and smaller in diameter. It fits a medium burner on your stove. I would not pressure can in this unit. However, if you are looking for simple ways to cook food faster, you should consider this.
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and size...
customer_reviews.text: This cooker works great! It is exactly what I was wanting. I wanted a cooker that was slightly smaller than usual. And I also wanted the two side handles so it's easier to store. Even though it is smaller, 6 quartz, I can still cook a 5 lbs of meat in it. It is a very nice quality built cooker!
customer_reviews.author: MarkZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Well engineered, Awesome design!
customer_reviews.text: Was initially off-put by the one-touch lid. It works great though. Feels sturdy, Good build quality, opens and closes easily, easy to clean and doesn't have separate parts to worry about misplacing. Solidly built, slim design, Cooks well too! Haven't used the steamer basket yet, but so far, impressed.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Culina Company does not appear to exist - Cannot find their customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this little pressure cooker...a lot. However, I lost the little pressure dial on top. I cannot find anything on this company. The customer service email in the instruction manual comes back undeliverable. The link listed in the manual for updates and recipes is not valid. I called a pressure cooker replacement part company, they have never heard of Culina. If anyone can get me in contact with Culina's customer service, I will be happy to up my review.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ferris

customer_reviews.title: You can use this just on a regular setting or as a pot with an extra lid.
customer_reviews.text: I had a low pressurized pressure cooker some call a rice cooker & it was falling apart and I bought this as I love cooking beans in a pressure cooker & this is the best one I have ever owned everything comes out perfect,
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pressure cooker that works great
customer_reviews.text: I received the pressure cooker promptly and it has been extremely helpful so far. It's great for pressure cooking vegetables, meat, poultry and can even act as a secondary rice cooker. Not only does it work great while cooking, cleaning the cooker is a breeze as well. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a good stovetop cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Vic2150

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is just the right size, and with the glass lid, I have been able to downsize my pots and pans. So versatile and easy to use. Appreciate the two handles and adaptability of being able to steam as well. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it yet. However, it looks solid and well made to last
customer_reviews.author: Camara. Y

customer_reviews.title: Easy lock feature
customer_reviews.text: Nice pot. Good weight. Easy lock feature for novice like me. Comes with basket that has handle- nice extra feature
customer_reviews.author: Faye11708

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to get use.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and cooks exactly how it should!
customer_reviews.author: Ceylan C.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, easy to use and clean, excellent price for the quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I picked the box up that this was a heavy duty pressure cooker. It is easy to use, works fantastic and it was 1/3 the price of another famous brand pressure cooker that I owned. Thank you Culina. Love it
customer_reviews.author: T.Glover

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family and quality is very very good . My aunt wants me to order for her .
customer_reviews.author: johnny sparks

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: Love this pressure cooker and love that it has the extra lid to it
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pressure cooker and it's the easiest and most reliable I've ever used
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: I am buying one for a friend for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, it is easy to clean, and best of all, it has an extra lid; so you can cook whatever you want in it.
customer_reviews.author: janet arnatt

customer_reviews.title: I've even used it a few times and it works great. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. She does wish it was a tad bigger, but other than that, it works fantastically. I've even used it a few times and it works great. Easy to use, easy to clean. I think the smaller size is actually more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely don't waste your money !
customer_reviews.text: Highly dissatisfied with this purchase. Very surprised at the other reviews with favorable remarks. This is the worst work ever. I took care of it as directed and it got burned inside and rusty on the outside. Seller's customer service never will back you or provide you any customer support . I just jave to close this very bad shopping experience donating this this horrible bad pressure cooker. I NEVER AGAIN WILL I PURCHASE ANYTHING MADE BY CULINA BRAND . Definitely don't waste your money !
customer_reviews.author: Patty 15

customer_reviews.title: May have worked great but we will never know - it came broken!
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law wanted one of these so we bought it for her for a Christmas gift. When it arrived at my houses it did not appear that the box had been damaged so I wrapped the pan and gave it to her for Christmas. When she opened the pan to use it, the handle had been broken off and placed inside the pan! She did not even get to use this. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Way too much money for a product that did not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Now they're perfect, every time
customer_reviews.text: This is the first one I've owned. It's finicky about bringing up cooking temp to the point where the pop-up button engages, but that's the nature of the beast. I still personally prefer the crock pot for flavor and moisture retention, but if time matters( as it so often does!) then this is the right tool for the pressure cooker job. The first attempt at smoked gouda grits were burned, but that was part of learning curve. Now they're perfect, every time. Meat, well, can't quite measure up to the crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Wave meister

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure cooker.  Love the way it looks and works.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure cooker is amazing. It works just as advertised and the one-press part is ingenious. Makes it really easy to put the lid on and off. I use it to make really quick stews and soups. Just be careful about the temperature after cooking because it really is SUPER hot. Be patient before eating.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: It is nicely designed. Good quality of the metal
customer_reviews.text: It is nicely designed. Good quality of the metal. Fits well on the stove because it tall and not wide. I use it pretty often. The pressure indicator does not pop up. You have literally to touch it to get it popped. This is the only negative thing that I can say.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure cooker couldnt cook without it
customer_reviews.text: I adore my pressure cooker. I almost cook solely with this item! I cook my son's baby food in it before pureeing, i make dinner in it, i make dog food in it! The open and close buttons are great and very happy with the stainless steel quality.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Small diameter - needs small burner
customer_reviews.text: I like this pressure cooker - but the diameter is small and can only be used on small burners - takes a little while to get up to steam. I use this in the travel trailer - suburban gas range - and its a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pressure cooker I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pressure cooker I've ever owned. The size is great for just me and my husband but would also work great for a family of 4. It's nice to have the glass lid because it makes the pot so much more versatile, especially when I need to keep something cooked in it warm. It is easy to clean and flat on the bottom for my glass top stove. I haven't tried the basket but am glad it's available.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B. Sciba

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality build and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality build and very easy to use. The steam that come out of the vent is warm to the touch while in operation or venting. Cooking with this pressure cooker is fun.
customer_reviews.author: ShopWisely

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Just the right sized for one or ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just the right sized for one or two people. Very well constructed and well built. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I would change about the is if the size was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I love using a pressure cooker, grew up with my dearly departed mother using pressure cookers. So ofcourse the little prodigy that I am, this is my 2nd stove top pressure cooker, the only thing I would change about the is if the size was bigger. Was gonna return it when I saw how small it was, but my husband talked me into keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancyb1167

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for 4 family  portion.Easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality pressure cooker. easy to use and very versatile. it comes with 2 type of lid . One for nonpressure cooker and one for pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: bibi

customer_reviews.title: Stew in an hour or less (including prep)
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to cookware, I'm a firm believer in doing your research. Most of the time you get what you pay for, but it's also really easy to pay a lot more than necessary. I looked at a lot of pressure cookers online and read plenty of reviews. I'm glad I bought the Culina One-Touch. I use it once/twice a month and haven't had any issues. Quality materials and a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: radmon

customer_reviews.title: I love this pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love this pressure cooker. The quality is great. It is so easy to use. It really is one touch and the lid locks.This is the best purchase I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pressure cooker near the end of the last year and have used it numerous times. It is a good heavy steel and works well. The lid and insert tray are also a good quality weight. Very happy with purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pclrtx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality pressure cooker. I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: honestJen

customer_reviews.title: Love this easy to use cooker
customer_reviews.text: Easy lid lock and unlock. Great quality heavy duty steel.
customer_reviews.author: reama10

customer_reviews.title: Works great, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great love it. Used it twice so far and plan on more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just came in today and I used it to make braised country style pork ribs. At first I was concerned it was too small to hold all 8, but they fit just fine and cooked in a fraction of the time. I like how versatile it is too and am sure I will be using it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as easy as it stays it is
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as easy as it stays it is, to operate; my wife uses it all of the time now
customer_reviews.author: DavidLJ48

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for Amazon who makes this process so easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as it did not hold pressure. Thank goodness for Amazon who makes this process so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Barely OK
customer_reviews.text: It will only fit 3 canning jars. I wish I could get the old fashioned kind with the jiggly top.
customer_reviews.author: jdjay

product_meta.title: Culina One-Touch Pressure Cooker. Stovetop, 6 Qt. Stainless Steel With Steamer Basket
product_meta.description:
EAT BETTER
COOK HEALTHY
SAVE ENERGY AND TIME


Cook delicious and healthy meals in minutes instead of hours, saving valuable time and energy with the Culina One-Touch Pressure Cooker. The 6 Quart size is perfect for creating quick family sized meals. Seal in vitamins, preserve vibrant vegetable colors and create dishes filled with nutrients and flavor. Added accessories make this an exceptionally versatile pressure cooker. 

The One-Touch locking mechanism is easy to operate with one hand. Push one button and the cover is secured in place, regardless of position. Adjust the pressure valve from low to high then let the pot do all the work. Fill the kitchen with aromas of delectable soups, pot roasts, ribs - you name it. Even use for canning. Full instructions (and a tasty recipe to start you off) are included. 

New technology makes pressure cookers easier and safer than ever. With six safety features to ensure the cover will never come off unintentionally, nor will it open if the pressure hasn’t been fully released. Adjust the pressure valve for slow or quick release of steam, without holding down the valve by hand. When cooking is complete, there are three ways to release pressure: natural release, steam release or placing under running water. UL Approved. 

Made from heavy gauge 18/10 stainless steel with an encapsulated aluminum base you can use on all stovetops, induction, gas, electric, ceramic and halogen. All parts are easy to clean. We suggest hand-washing to keep it looking new (especially the cover), but it is dishwasher-safe. With proper care, the pot and accessories will last you a lifetime. 

The Culina 6-Quart One-Touch Pressure Cooker will provide you with countless delicious and healthy meals. The sleek, high-quality design makes it ideal for any kitchen - and a great gift for anyone with an interest in the Culinary arts. Best of all, it includes Culina 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
feature_bullets: CULINA QUALITY 18/10 stainless steel Pressure Cooker has a 6 quart capacity and cooks foods up to 70% faster than conventional cooking, saving you time and lowering your energy bill. Includes a heavy gauge, stainless steel steamer basket and tempered glass lid.

EASY One-Touch open and close mechanism allows for one-hand operation. Locking mechanism secures pressure cooker cover to the pot in any position. Adjustable Pressure Valve can be set to low, high or steam release. Water Level markings inside the pot ensure correct pressure and optimal results. Steamer insert for perfectly cooked vegetables, seafood and more!

SAFE Six safety features, including visible red pressure indicator that pops up when pressurized. Safety Valve. Cover will not open when pressure has not been fully released. Large, ergonomic handles. Silicone gasket is BPA-free. UL Approved.

DURABLE Constructed from heavy-duty 18/10 stainless steel with a satin finish, the Culina Pressure Cooker has an encapsulated aluminum base to ensure even heat distribution. Can be used on all stovetops, even Induction Heating. All parts are easy to clean, although dishwasher-safe, hand washing is recommended to maintain finish.
